Package ispd.motor.workload.impl.task

Class ExternalTraceTaskBuilder

java.lang.Object
ispd.motor.workload.impl.task.TaskBuilder
ispd.motor.workload.impl.task.TraceTaskBuilder
ispd.motor.workload.impl.task.ExternalTraceTaskBuilder
public class ExternalTraceTaskBuilder extends TraceTaskBuilder
Specialization of task building from traces for external models. Its behavioral differences are:
  • When making a task, it checks if such task must be set to be cancelled, and processes it accordingly.
  • Task computation size is normalized with the average computational power of the queue network.
  • Task communication size is randomly generated from a TwoStageUniform distribution.
See Also:
  • makeTaskFor(Processing)
  • makeTaskComputationSize()
  • makeTaskCommunicationSize()

  • Constructor Details

    • ExternalTraceTaskBuilder

      public ExternalTraceTaskBuilder (List<TraceTaskInfo> traceTaskInfos, Distribution random, double averageCompPower)
      Initialize an instance with the given List of TraceTaskInfos to be converted into tasks, Distribution to generate the task communication size, and average computation power to normalize the task computation size.
      Parameters:
      traceTaskInfos - list of task information to be converted into tasks.
      random - random double generator to produce communication sizes.
      averageCompPower - average computational power of the GridQueueNetwork containing the masters which tasks will be generated for.

  • Method Details

    • makeTaskFor

      public GridTask makeTaskFor (Processing master)
      Generate a task with information from the inner list. If it is determined that the task should be cancelled, its processing local is set to the given Processing and it is set to be cancelled instantly (on instant 0.0).
      Overrides:
      makeTaskFor in class TraceTaskBuilder
      Parameters:
      master - Processing that will host the task.
      Returns:
      created (and possibly cancelled) GridTask.
      See Also:
      • TraceTaskInfo.shouldBeCanceled()
      • GridTask.setLocalProcessamento(Service)
      • GridTask.cancelar(double)

    • makeTaskComputationSize

      protected double makeTaskComputationSize()
      Make the task's computation size, calculated from the value found in the file for such property, but normalized to account for the average computational power of the machines in the model.
      Overrides:
      makeTaskComputationSize in class TraceTaskBuilder
      Returns:
      the calculated task computation size (in MFlops).
